scheduleMeetingForm.configuteTeamsMeetingTooltip: Please enable Microsoft Teams support in admin settings first!
scheduleMeetingForm.commentFieldPlaceholder: Add a comment, dial-in info will be appended automatically
scheduleMeetingForm.availabilityStatusFreeButSomeUnknown: The availability of some attendees is unknown

dateTimePickerForm.occurInPastTooltip: This meeting would occur in the past

meetingSuggestion.noMeetingSuggestionsPlaceholder: Select participants to see meeting suggestions.

scheduleMeetingDialogFooter.sendMeetingTooltip: Send an Outlook meeting request to all attendees and - if selected - add an issue comment with the meeting details

adminSettingsScreen.learnMoreFlagDescription: Welcome to {{ appName }}. Go to any issue and log in with your Office 365 account to get started!
adminSettingsScreen.scheduleMeetingDescription: You can schedule meetings from any issue, using the schedule button on the top.
adminSettingsScreen.inValidLicenseText: You don't have a valid license or it has expired. If you'd like to continue using our app, please get valid license!
adminSettingsScreen.microsoftLoginChangeWarning: Are you sure you want to change the way how to authenticate with Microsoft? This may impacts if users are able to login.
adminSettingsScreen.removeCustomAppRegsitrationWarning: Are you sure you want to remove the custom app registration? The app will fallback to the Yasoon standard app and it may impacts if users are able to login.
adminSettingsScreen.customADAppDescription: This setting allows you to use a custom, self-hosted AzureAD enterprise app registration.
adminSettingsScreen.tenantIdFieldPlaceholder: Enter the tenant id of the registered app
adminSettingsScreen.visibilitySettingsDescription: Use the settings below to enable or disable the app for each project by default. Each setting can be overridden in the project settings.
adminSettingsScreen.sentrySettingsDescription_html:
Help us to improve our product. We use Sentry to automatically capture errors in the application - so they do not happen again.
Sentry is an important part for our product development team, so "thank you", if you turn it on.
adminSettingsScreen.templateSettingsDescription: You can adjust the template below to customize the meeting request that is sent via Outlook. You can use all available fields of the issue using the {"{{issue.field}}"} syntax. Please note that only a very limited set of HTML is supported.
adminSettingsScreen.templateSavedFlagDescription: The templates have been saved successfully.

officeLoginScreen.heading: Welcome to Outlook Meetings for Jira
officeLoginScreen.description: Looks like you are using the app for the very first time. Please login with your Microsoft 365 account to get started!

projectSettingScreen.heading: Outlook Meetings for Jira
projectSettingScreen.visibilityDescription: The following visibility settings will only affect the current project.
projectSettingScreen.availabilityDescription_html: The following settings control the appearance of the Outlook Availabilities panel.
projectSettingScreen.participantsDescription_html:
You can configure which user issue fields should be taken into account when searching for available meeting times.
If you specify a text or label field, we'll try to identify valid email addresses.
projectSettingScreen.defaultAvailabilitySettingsLabel: Include all fields of a issue with users.
projectSettingScreen.suggestionsNumberDescription: Configure how many meeting slot suggestions should be shown.
projectSettingScreen.suggestionsStrategyDescription: Determines how suggested time slots are determined
projectSettingScreen.dialogDescription: Here you can customize certain aspects of the Schedule Meeting dialog.
projectSettingScreen.timePickerStepsDescription: How many steps should be displayed in the time picker
projectSettingScreen.channelIdDescription: Configure which Teams channel should host the meetings. The channel will be notified when the meeting starts & chats will appear in the channel.
projectSettingScreen.additionalDescription:
This is currently a way to unlock certain hidden configurations, mostly custom developments that only makes sense for single customers.
Do not use if not told so by the support team.
projectSettingScreen.additionalInvalidNoArray: Additional config must be an array type.
